Package org.bremersee.ldaptive

Interface LdaptiveOperations

All Known Implementing Classes:
LdaptiveSambaTemplate, LdaptiveTemplate
public interface LdaptiveOperations
The interface for ldap operations.
Author:
Christian Bremer
